content: Make us Your Home for the Holidays

Friends and family, it’s what we all love about the holidays. We provide you with the next best thing to home. 
This year you’ll enjoy Santa and Mrs. Claus, plus we’re bringing back many of our popular enhancements sure
to make your stay at Buena Vista Suites feel a lot like home.

SANTA & MRS. CLAUS
We’re expecting a couple of famous visitors this year! Santa and Mrs. Claus will be available in our main lobby to meet the kids and hear Christmas wishes.
Stop by and take photos with the Claus’ during the following dates and times:

Friday, December 20 from 8:30am – 10:30am
Saturday, December 21 from 8:30am – 10:30am
Sunday, December 22 from 8:30am – 10:30am
